rows.name: text_1
rows.value: The pop-up launched by the following button should dismiss when "completed" or "uncompleted" is emitted:
rows.comments: This is the case whether or not the parent template has an action handler for "completed"/"uncompleted"

rows.name: text_2
rows.value: When returning (e.g. because the next template emits completed) to a pop-up that has been dismissed, instead one should return to the underlying template:
